name: Harpers
symbol: A silver harp between the horns of a crescent moon
beliefs: The Harpers believe that too much power leads to corruption, and that a balance of power must be maintained between all civilized races. They gather information, oppose tyranny, and promote fairness and equality through stealth and subtlety rather than open warfare.
goals: Promote fairness and equality by covert means
Thwart tyrants and leaders who grow too powerful
Aid the weak, the poor, and the oppressed

ranks.title: Watcher
ranks.description: New inductee, trusted with basic missions.

ranks.title: Harpshadow
ranks.description: Proven agent with access to the Harper network.

ranks.title: Brightcandle
ranks.description: Respected member who can requisition aid.

ranks.title: High Harper
ranks.description: Member of the inner council guiding Harper strategy.

benefits.benefit: Access to the Harper network of safe houses and information brokers.
A Harper contact who can provide intelligence on a topic (once per adventure).
Can request a team of 1d4 spies for a mission.
Access to rare magic items on loan (must be returned).
Can call an emergency meeting of High Harpers and shape faction policy.
